communications.subject: Minnesota Government Data Practices Act Request: Official Job Description Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. I request all official job descriptions posted and used to hire staff under job requisition #301351.
2. I request all official job descriptions posted and used to hire staff under job requisition #301638.
3. I request all official job descriptions posted and used to hire staff under job requisition #303498.

By referring to an "official job description," I am referring to the type of job description and information documenting specific responsibilities unique to the department hiring the personnel and the qualifications (required and preferred) that were used to hire potential candidates for these jobs. Please ensure that the information provided is specific to the positions advertised under each requisition number and does not include general job classification descriptions.

Please name or identify which files you upload apply to each requisition # above.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

InfoInquirer
